Welcome to DiWaCS documentation!
================================
DiWaCS is an application developed for `DiWa smart space <https://cse.aalto.fi/research/groups/stratus/research/research-projects/>`_
and should be used **only** inside **Diwaamo**.
DiWaCS connects to address **239.128.128.1:5555** using `Pragmatic General Multicast (PGM) <http://code.google.com/p/openpgm/>`_.
DiWaCS is built on `Python <http://www.python.org>`_ and `WxPython <http://www.wxpython.org>`_ is used for UI programming.
Currently, only supported platform is **Windows 7**.

Required python modules for DiWaCS:
  * `Configobj <http://www.voidspace.org.uk/python/configobj.html>`_
  * `lxml <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/lxml/>`_
  * `PIL <http://www.pythonware.com/products/pil/>`_
  * `PyAudio <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/PyAudio>`_
  * `Python Pubsub <http://pubsub.sourceforge.net/>`_
  * `SQLAlchemy <http://www.sqlalchemy.org/>`_
  * `Watchdog  <http://packages.python.org/watchdog/>`_
  * `WMI <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/WMI/1.4.9/>`_
  * `WxPython <http://www.wxpython.org>`_
  * `ZeroMQ <http://zeromq.org>`_ with `openpgm <http://code.google.com/p/openpgm/>`_ support
